about_the_game:
Because the offense, defense and transition between offense and defense are faster. The means of attack and defense are more diverse.

Teamwork is a guarantee of victory
Game core gameplay rules

Victory conditions: Break the opponent's 3 forts and capture the 3 lucky eggs in the forts to be the winner.

Divided into red and blue teams, each team has 4 to 5 people or more.

The main body of the game is divided into 4 sections, each section is 8 minutes.

During a one-and-a-half-minute break between each section, the game will force both parties to return to their original positions.

Players can adjust their strategies, replenish their ammunition, and launch their attack again.

There will be no timeout after four quarters, and both sides will fight until victory.

name: run fire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060/AMD Radeon rx 580
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible

short_description: Original gameplay rules, an e-sports shooting game with real-time battles and strategy as its core.Attack, defend, lay mines, set up firewalls, traps, ambush, and various real-time battles, giving players a full range of intense combat experience.
